types.html:
payole f (plural payoles)

  1. (Corrèze) a straw hat worn by women
    • 1874, Gazette des Tribunaux, page 1218:
      Cette caisse contient les habits de l’accusé au moment du crime, la payole et la quenouille de la victime.
      This case contains the clothes of the accused at the moment of the crime, the straw hat, and the distaff of the victim.
trans: a straw hat worn by women

title: payole
